scripts.ci:typecheck: npm run -w apps/server typecheck && npm run -w tango-web type-check
scripts.ci:lint: npm run -w apps/server lint && npm run -w tango-web lint
scripts.ci:test: npm run -w apps/server test --if-present && npm run -w tango-web test --if-present
scripts.ci:build: npm run -w apps/server build && npm run -w tango-web build
scripts.ci:format:check: npm run -w apps/server format:check --if-present && npm run -w tango-web format:check --if-present
